attributes.action: instruct the football league to not schedule midweek league games on the same days as Champion's league games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Throughout the existence of the UEFA Champion's League the football league, in their wisdom, have scheduled football league games to be played on the same night. This then in turn affects the attendances at these league games, with many supporters deciding to stay at home and watch the Champion's League games on television. Surely with many Football League clubs suffering financial difficulties it would make sense to schedule the games when more people are likely to attend. We, therefore, ask the Prime Minister to speak to the Football League and advise them not to schedule midweek League games on the same night as Champion's League matches.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
